body.name: Cold Brew Coffee Maker - Cold Brew - Iced Coffee - 64 oz Cold Brew Maker - Iced Coffee Maker - Cold Brew Mason Jar - Ice Coffee - Cold Brewer Coffee Maker - Cold Brew Pitcher - Cold Brew Mason Jar
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 23 mins
features: Easy To Use 64 oz (2 Quart / 1.9 Liter) Cold Brew Pitcher - Made from durable, BPA-free, food-grade glass in a mason-jar style, the Home Hero cold brew maker delivers a smooth homemade brew. Just add coffee, cold water, and let it steep! No need for frequent coffee shop visits while you work from home. Note: Do not pour boiling water inside the mason jar tea infuser to avoid cracking.

Stainless Steel Filter - The secret to perfect cold brew lies in our cold brewer coffee maker's high-quality 304 stainless steel mesh, ensuring longevity and preventing coffee grounds from entering your mason jar. Delight in every sip! Note: It's natural for a hint of coffee grounds to be present in your brew.

2 Leakproof Lids - Our cold brew coffee maker features two lids—a flip cap lid with a convenient handle for effortless brewing, pouring, and storing, and an on-the-go lid for your coffee adventures. Keep your ice coffee fresh for longer and prevent leaks wherever you go.

Easy to Clean - Our cold coffee maker's components are dishwasher safe, or you can easily clean them by hand with soapy water and a quick rinse. Spend more time enjoying your brew and less time at the sink. Discover the joy of fuss-free maintenance with our curated coffee accessories!

Versatile Drink Maker - Beyond cold brew, our cold brew coffee pitcher is perfect for crafting iced tea, lemonade, and more. Savor a wide array of delicious drinks with this multi-purpose cold brew mason jar and iced tea maker, complete with bonus recipes in the manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Cold Brew
reviews.reviewText: I love this cold brew maker! It is excellent and extremely easy to make my cold brew at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: if you drink a lot of cold brew I highly recommend getting this! It is very easy to use and comes with instructions to tell you exactly what you need to do including how much of the coffee grounds it takes to steep.Also doesn't break the bank!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with my purchase. We love cold brew and this make the amount we desire. I love that it comes with two lids and it is very sleek and worth the price. I recommend this to all my friends and family that love cold brew as much as we do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and convenient!
reviews.reviewText: I have been loving this product. It has saved me so much money already on my daily coffee. It is so easy to use and makes a few days of cold brew. I love the measurements on the glass that tells you how much is left and the size of this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This is as easy as grinding your coffee beans and pouring cold water in. I let it sit overnight on counter and it work fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cold brew
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of use and the taste of the cold brew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for college
reviews.reviewText: Good and easy for using in college! Makes a ton of coffee and fairly simple to use. The coffee it makes is very dependent on what coffee you get. Certainly nothing revolutionary, but you get what is expected!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I need not I can make cold brew coffee at home and save money. So far it's worked great. Fill with water the place metal tube in with coffee grounds. Do not do grounds then fill with water or else it can push some grinds out but if you do water first grinds don't slip threw.
